players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I am shocked about Diana. We need to be calm and share alibis — who spoke to Diana last night?"
You: "Terrible news about Diana. I didn't talk to her last night. Bob, did you actually speak to her? And Charlie — where were you?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso — I investigated him last night."
Bob: "Charlie, accusing me so quickly is suspicious. Why would you out an investigation result without proof? If you actually investigated me, tell us what you found — or admit you're guessing."

Charlie: "Bob tested mafioso when I investigated last night. I know it's sudden, but I had to share the result so town can act. Bob, please explain your interactions with Diana and why you'd lie about not speaking to her."

You: "Charlie, that was a bold reveal — if you're telling the truth, we should trust you, but we need some verification. Bob, where were you last night and why were you near Diana? Charlie, why did you wait to reveal until now and who else did you consider investigating?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

Night 1 begins.

Day 1 begins.

Alice: "Terrible news about Diana. I didn't talk to her last night. Bob, did you actually speak to her? And Charlie — where were you?"

You: "Charlie, accusing me so quickly is suspicious. Why would you out an investigation result without proof? If you actually investigated me, tell us what you found — or admit you're guessing."

Charlie: "Bob tested mafioso when I investigated last night. I know it's sudden, but I had to share the result so town can act. Bob, please explain your interactions with Diana and why you'd lie about not speaking to her."

Alice: "Charlie, that was a bold reveal — if you're telling the truth, we should trust you, but we need some verification. Bob, where were you last night and why were you near Diana? Charlie, why did you wait to reveal until now and who else did you consider investigating?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I am shocked about Diana. We need to be calm and share alibis — who spoke to Diana last night?"
Alice: "Terrible news about Diana. I didn't talk to her last night. Bob, did you actually speak to her? And Charlie — where were you?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso — I investigated him last night."
Bob: "Charlie, accusing me so quickly is suspicious. Why would you out an investigation result without proof? If you actually investigated me, tell us what you found — or admit you're guessing."

You: "Bob tested mafioso when I investigated last night. I know it's sudden, but I had to share the result so town can act. Bob, please explain your interactions with Diana and why you'd lie about not speaking to her."

Alice: "Charlie, that was a bold reveal — if you're telling the truth, we should trust you, but we need some verification. Bob, where were you last night and why were you near Diana? Charlie, why did you wait to reveal until now and who else did you consider investigating?"
